oai_dc:dc.dc:description: kerri The || bird eats locusts and is thus called the locust-bird. They drive the locusts into the bushes, where the people collect them and roast them in a fire. The people thirst after collecting locusts and need water. The rain then breaks and the people go and hunt for springbok.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: kerri The ||: a bird which eats locusts; and locust-hunting
